titleStmt.title: Proposals made to the reverend clergy of the arch-deaconry of Norwich, concerning the reformation of manners, and promoting the interest of true religion and virtue. Together with a specimen of the assistance they may afford their parishioners for attaining religious knowledge, and exercising Christian devotion. By John Jeffery, D.D. Arch-deacon of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Jeffery, John, 1647-1720.
